Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the MCD family Bombolitin subfamily
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Mast cell degranulating peptide. May also display antibacterial and antifungal activities (By similarity).

Literature.Title: Mass spectrometry strategies for venom mapping and peptide sequencing from crude venoms case applications with single arthropod specimen.
Literature.Author: Favreau P, Menin L, Michalet S, Perret F, Cheneval O, Stöcklin M, Bulet P, Stöcklin R.
